actions.name: Rocket Launcher
actions.description: The atlas targets an area within 60m. Each creature within 6m of the target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) thunder damage or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendaryActions.name: Eject
legendaryActions.description: The pilot of the Atlas ejects, landing in an unoccupied space within 40m. The pilot is an Assault Trooper. The Atlas then self-destructs. Each creature within a 6m radius must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 39 (6d12) thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.

legendaryActions.name: Mass Accelerator Cannon Attack
legendaryActions.description: The atlas makes a Mass Accelerator Cannon attack.

legendaryActions.name: Smash Attack
legendaryActions.description: The atlas makes a Smash attack.
